LanguageData.Apparel_SoEDGoldSkin.label: gold skin
LanguageData.Apparel_SoEDGoldSkin.description: Rolled gold, enough to cover the body. Healing agents are attributed, but this is not so. Titled persons will be happy. Wear in lieu of underwear.
LanguageData.SoED_GoldLeaf.label: gold leaf
LanguageData.SoED_GoldLeaf.description: Gold rolled into a thin layer.
LanguageData.SoED_GoldWaste.label: gold pises
LanguageData.SoED_GoldWaste.description: A golden piece, need to collect more than one such one so that you can say that you have gold.
LanguageData.SoED_GildingMetal.label: gilding metal
LanguageData.SoED_GoldJaw.label: Grillz
LanguageData.SoED_GoldJaw.description: Variety of dental jewelry. To highlight your importance.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSandstoneGilded.label: sandstone blocks gilded
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSandstoneGilded.description: Gilded Blocks of solid sandstone. Sandstone is a relatively soft rock and chips easily. Covered with a thin layer of gold. Gilding can be removed by sacrificing blocks. Gold plating makes the blocks combustible.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksGraniteGilded.label: granite blocks gilded
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksGraniteGilded.description: Gilded Blocks of solid granite. Granite is a very hard stone. Covered with a thin layer of gold. Gilding can be removed by sacrificing blocks. Gold plating makes the blocks combustible.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksLimestoneGilded.label: limestone blocks gilded
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksLimestoneGilded.description: Gilded Blocks of solid limestone. Covered with a thin layer of gold. Gilding can be removed by sacrificing blocks. Gold plating makes the blocks combustible.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSlateGilded.label: slate blocks gilded
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksSlateGilded.description: Gilded Blocks of solid slate. A dull-looking rock that chips easily. Covered with a thin layer of gold. Gilding can be removed by sacrificing blocks. Gold plating makes the blocks combustible.
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksMarbleGilded.label: marble blocks gilded
LanguageData.SoED_BlocksMarbleGilded.description: Gilded Blocks of solid marble. Marble is a soft, beautiful stone, known for being easy to sculpt. Covered with a thin layer of gold. Gilding can be removed by sacrificing blocks. Gold plating makes the blocks combustible.
